summary: A nerd from Chicago tries desperately to fit in with the California surfing crowd, blind to the fact that their lives are even more boring and empty than his.
cast: Glynnis O'Connor|Seymour Cassel|Dorothy Tristan|Dennis Christopher|John Calvin|Todd Susman|Tanya Roberts|Alice Playten|Ned Wynn|James Van Patten|Stacey Nelkin|Johnny Fain|Tom McFadden|Tom Rosqui|Marshall Efron|Barton Heyman|Kirsten Baker|Shannon Terhune|Vivian Bonnell|James Staley|Bonnie Bartlett|Carol O'Leary|Ernest Misko|Buddy Kling|Rene Lea|Becky Nelson|Cheri Capps|Walt Schlim|Charles Graffeo
director: Director: John D. Hancock (as John Hancock)
